\begin{picture}(100,100)
\put(0,0){
\Qcircuit @C=1.5em @R=1em {
	\lstick{q_0:~\ket{0}} &  \gate{S} & \gate{R(\phi_1)} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \qw & \multigate{1}{BS} &\qw& \multigate{1}{BS} &\measureD{\hat{n}}\\
	\lstick{q_1:~\ket{0}} &\gate{S} &  \gate{R(\phi_2)} & \ghost{BS} & \multigate{1}{BS}& \ghost{BS} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \ghost{BS}&\measureD{\hat{n}}\\
	\lstick{q_2:~\ket{0}} & \gate{S} & \gate{R(\phi_3)} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \ghost{BS} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \ghost{BS}& \multigate{1}{BS}&\measureD{\hat{n}}\\
	\lstick{q_3:~\ket{0}} & \gate{S} & \gate{R(\phi_4)} & \ghost{BS} & \qw & \ghost{BS} & \qw  & \ghost{BS}&\measureD{\hat{n}}
}
}
